context.name: Dillon D-Terminator Electronic Scale
context.excerpt: The Dillon D-Terminator Scale is a high-end professional-grade providing amazing accuracy up to 900 grains at 0.1 grain or 0.01-gram scale. This is the only scale you need for your reloading workbench.
context.content:
The Dillon D-Terminator Electronic Scale is a high-end professional-grade scale. Using new load cell technology and advanced software, this digital scale provides amazing accuracy up to 900 grains at 0.1 grain or 0.01-gram increments with fast, stable, and accurate results!

The Dillon D-Terminator Scale is the only scale you will need on your reloading workbench.

Dillon D-Terminator Key features:

900 grain/57 gram capacity
Accurate to 0.1 grain/0.01 gram
Supplied with dust/wind shield cover, stainless steel powder pan, including 50 gram calibration weight
Uses 4 AA batteries (included).
